thread.title: Reports: Lamar Odom opened his eyes and asked for his children
thread.title_full: Reports: Lamar Odom opened his eyes and asked for his children

title: Reports: Lamar Odom opened his eyes and asked for his children
text: Share Updated: 2:36 pm LAS VEGAS (KSNV News3LV) – As the nation watches and waits for news about ex-NBA star Lamar Odom’s condition, News 3 captured the moments when Odom’s children arrived at Sunrise Hospital on Friday.Multiple news outlets are now reporting that Odom opened his eyes today and asked for his children. According to the Associated Press, A spokeswoman for Lamar Odom's aunt confirms those reports and says that the NBA star woke up and spoke.“Alvina Alston, publicist for JaNean Mercer, Odom's maternal aunt and godmother, said that Odom spoke a greeting and gave a thumps up Friday morning, his first communication since being hospitalized,” says AP.Earlier Friday, TMZ reported that hospital sources told them Odom’s heart was finally healing. At the time of the report, Odom was still believed to be in a coma. Odom was found unresponsive on Tuesday inside the Love Ranch brothel in Crystal, Nevada. The Nye County Sheriff’s Department and public 9-1-1 calls reveal that the athlete had cocaine in his system and was taking herbal Viagra while staying at the ranch.New surveillance video from Love Ranch shows Odom going into the brothel on Saturday evening. Brothel owner, Dennis Hof, says Odom spent $75,000 to stay in a VIP suite at the ranch. Family and friends of Odom accuse Hof of taking advantage of the athlete and overcharging him for his stay. Aunt of #LamarOdom seen taking break outside. Her rep confirms #Odom "woke up & spoke" LIVE 3p @News3LV #News3LV pic.twitter.com/iT7RvZiJ3l — Vicki Gonzalez (@VickiNews3LV) October 16, 2015 Unconfirmed reports say Lamar Odom woke up & asked to see his kids. During my @News3LV live shot @ 12p his kids were going into the hospital
